search.query: | rest /services/data/models search="acceleration=1" | fields eai:acl.app, title, acceleration.earliest_time | rename eai:acl.app AS app, title AS model, acceleration.earliest_time AS aet | map maxsearches=40 search="| rest /services/admin/summarization/tstats:DM_$$app$$_$$model$$/details | eval model_name=\"$$model$$\" | eval aet=\"$$aet$$\" | search splunk_server=$host$ | rename comment AS \" fields bucket_et, bucket_lt, index, bucket_id, bucket_is_hot, bucket_path, bucket_size, eai:acl.app, model_name, splunk_server, summary_complete, summary_hot_done, summary_path, summary_size, title \" " | rex field=title "^details_(?<Indexer>[^:]+)\:(?<Index>[^:]+)\:(?<primary_guid>[^:]+)$" | join type=left splunk_server, index [| rest /services/data/indexes | fields splunk_server, title, tstatsHomePath, tstatsHomePath_expanded, frozenTimePeriodInSecs | rename title AS index ] | rex field=tstatsHomePath "^volume:(?<tstats_volume>[^/\\\\]+)[/\\\\]"

| rest /services/data/summaries search="type=data_model_acceleration" splunk_server=$host$ | join type=left search_head_guid [| rest /services/server/info | rename guid AS search_head_guid | fields splunk_server, search_head_guid ] | eval server_name=coalesce(splunk_server, search_head_guid)

input.label: Host
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup fb_hostname_index_cache | stats count by orig_host

chart.title: Relative Size of Summary Data by SH

search.query: stats sum(total_size), sum(total_bucket_count) AS count by server_name

chart.title: Usage Per Index / Model for this SH

search.query: chart sum(summary_size) AS MBytes OVER model_name by Index

chart.title: Retention Times by Affected Index, Model

search.query: | eval aet_sec=now() - round(relative_time(now(), aet), 0) | appendpipe [| stats max(aet_sec) AS model_time by model_name ] | eval index=if(isnotnull(model_time), "Model Retention", index), seconds=coalesce(model_time, frozenTimePeriodInSecs) | eval days=round(seconds / 86400, 0) | chart max(days) OVER model_name BY index
